title: Kita: or, What have you done for me lately?
creator_credit: BNA Films, Richard L. Wormser and William C. Jersey
brief_description: Frederick Herzberg points out that improvements in hygiene, wages, working conditions, and fringe benefits do not have a lasting effect on job motivation, and that the work people do is more important than how they are treated.
